project.name: J-C584A-CMUD-05-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF01-01
project.description: CWE-584 Return Inside Finally This test takes the name of a file as input. It then attempts to get the absolute path of the file and open it for reading. Since GetAbsolutePath.getAbsolutePath has a return in a finally clause, any generated warnings are dropped, eventually leading to a null pointer exception.

iopair.name: J-C584A-CMUD-05-ST01-DT01-DF05-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variables

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

process.file: This is some text, it is in the file.

process.script: sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
